p: The moisture content of the matrix patches must be low so that the patches remain stable and do not completely dry to form brittle patches (Gannu et al. 2007). The small moisture content ranging from 0.10 ± 0.23 to 0.52 ± 0.022 indicates that a stable formulation was prepared. The moisture uptake by patches was also less, i.e., between 0.21 ± 0.026 and 0.72 ± 0.014%. This is important for preventing microbial contamination and also lowers bulkiness (Ubaidulla et al. 2007).
